member.name: T:NaturalSort.NaturalSortComparer
member.summary: A comparer of strings that preserves the order of numerical substrings. For example, File2 comes before File10, which is the opposite of usual lexicographical ordering.
member.remarks: values are sorted to the start of the collection. The comparison is case-sensitive.

member.name: P:NaturalSort.NaturalSortComparer.Ordinal
member.summary: Gets a singleton instance of this comparer for which non-integer characters are compared ordinally.
